    • Method Detail

      • generateReport

        public java.lang.String generateReport()
        Generates a report based on the paired enrolment system.
        The report is a list of Students, Faculties, Units, and enrolled Students in the following format:
         
 Students:
 \t<Student>
 \t<Student>
 <Faculty>
 \t<Unit>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t<Unit>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t\t<enrolledStudent>
 <Faculty>
 \t<Unit>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t<Unit>
 \t\t<enrolled Student>
 \t\t<enrolledStudent>
 
 

        
 And where the objects referred to in <angle brackets> are represented in the following formats: 

        
 Student: SID unikey name preferredname
        
 Faculty: abbreviation name
        
 Unit: code name

        
 All attributes are separated with a single space. In the case of a null preferred name there will be a
 trailing separator space with no characters where the preferred name would otherwise be.
        
 Newlines are \n.


        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None
        Returns:
        The report as a multi-line string.
